name: Feather to Tabular
title: Feather to Tabular
description: WIPP plugin to converts Feather file format to Tabular Data.
author: Kelechi Nina Mezu (nina.mezu@nih.gov)
institution: National Center for Advancing Translational Sciences, National Institutes of Health

inputs.name: format
inputs.description: Output file type to convert from feather file

inputs.name: inpDir
inputs.description: Input image collection to be processed by this plugin

ui.title: Filename pattern
ui.description: Output file type to convert from feather file. ex: .parquet or .csv

ui.title: Input collection
ui.description: Input generic data collection to be processed by this plugin
